summary: Adds 4 different types of elven followers to your game.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]STANDALONE MOD[/size], no other mods are required.

Only requirements are: latest patch of Skyrim and SKSE if you want to use the CME preset save.


[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/2/24/a1_2014_2_24_2r8bz72ltj.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#ce2d29]Location:[/color] Dragonsreach - Whiterun

[color=#ce2d29]CLASS:[/color] Spellsword

[color=#ce2d29]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#ce2d29]Skills[/color]

- Destruction
- Heavy Armor
- One-handed

[color=#ce2d29]Perks[/color]

- Destruction : Augmented Flames, Destruction Dual Casting, Impact
- Heavy Armor : Juggernaut, Tower Of Strength, Reflect Blows, Fists of Steel
- One-Handed : Armsman, Hack And Slash, Bladesman, Fighting Stance, Savage Strike

- Sneak : Lightfoot


[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/2/24/a1_2014_2_24_t8isofukfb.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#24823c]Location:[/color] Dragonsreach - Whiterun

[color=#24823c]CLASS:[/color] Thief, Ranger

[color=#24823c]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#24823c]Skills[/color]

- Archery
- Light Armor
- Pickopcket
- Lockpicking
- Sneak

[color=#24823c]Perks[/color]

- Archery : Overdraw, Ranger, Critical Shot, Quick Shot
- Light Armor : Agile Defender, Custom Fit, Wind Walker, Deft Movement
- Pickpocket: Light Fingers, Night Thief, Cutpurse, Keymaster
- Lockpicking: Adept, Expert, Master Locks, Quick Hands
- Sneak : Lightfoot, Sneak20, Deadly Aim


[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/2/25/a1_2014_2_25_fqc9gvrtcf.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#bbb13e]Location:[/color] Frozen Heart - Winterhold

[color=#bbb13e]CLASS:[/color] Nightblade, Assassin

[color=#bbb13e]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#bbb13e]Skills[/color]

- Alteration
- One-handed
- Sneak

[color=#bbb13e]Perks[/color]

- Alteration: Alteration dual casting, Paralyze
- One-handed: Armsman, Bladesman, Paralyzing Strike, Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery
- Sneak: Lightfoot, Silence, Deadly Aim, Assassins Blade, Backstab, Sneak80, Muffled Movement


[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/2/25/a1_2014_2_25_vfny00txlh.jpg[/img] [/center]

[color=#54beba]Location:[/color] Arcaneum - College of Winterhold

[color=#54beba]CLASS:[/color] Mystic, Mage

[color=#54beba]Flags:[/color] Essential, Marriageable

[color=#54beba]Skills[/color]

-Conjuration
-Alteration
-Restoration

[color=#54beba]Perks[/color]

-Alteration: Mage Armor, Magic Restistance
-Conjuration: Atromancy, Dual Casting, Conjuration novice-expert, Elemental Potency,
Twin souls,
-Restoration: Respite, Avoid Death, Regeneration, Recovery, Dual Casting


[color=#ce2d29][b]About BBP Patch:[/b][/color]

First make sure u have:

- A required skeleton -> XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?
(For example)

- Animation for BBP -> Victorias High Heel walk Animation plus BBP -> http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13272/?
(For example)


Please report any bugs or issues!

Always feel free to add your pictures. ^^



[color=#ce2d29][size=4][b]CREDITS:[/b][/size][/color]


Bethesda for Skyrim

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by HelloSanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url] by Caliente

Thank you for your great works and permissions!

AND

Thank you for the great tutorials:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/?]Tutorial - Creating Standalone NPCs by Natilde[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33106/?]Standalone Followers Tutorial by zzjay[/url]


RECOMMENDED MODS:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13571/?]DUAL WIELD for Followers by fLokii[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48470/?] The Hairstyler by Lycanthrops[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?] Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster[/url]

Other

Currently im working on an asian follower. I accept advices, recommendations, feedbacks.
If you are interested in her, i really would like to use sg hairs (originally created by authors making sims hair meshes, thats why all of them were removed from the nexus), i really would like to get the permission.
But none of the authors reply to my tons of emails ive been sending to them.
Any helps are appreciated and welcomed.

Work in progress:

[center] [img]http://www.kephost.com/images4/2014/3/7/a1_2014_3_7_z3r0grz76r.jpg[/img] [/center]
